Text:
Hello.  Thanks for posting FURYMAX high quality scans.  You guys are the best!  Looking forward to the final issue next month.

Would it be possible to post the newest and last Garth Ennis Battlefields series that ended last week?  It's 3 issues long and called the Fall and Rise of Anna Kharkova.  All the other Battlefields series are available in high quality scans on this website.

Also, the first two issues of the new Ennis Dynamite series Red Team are on this site bu the next two issues which have come out are not on the site.  Thanks!

@PM87:
I just saw your post and request, so I apologize for not answering sooner. If I find your request tomorrow I will upload it ;)
